import React from 'react'; import '../index.css'; // For general styling const About = () => { return (

About GarudaTax AI

Welcome to GarudaTax AI, your trusted partner for simplified and intelligent tax filing. Our platform leverages cutting-edge Artificial Intelligence to streamline the complex process of income tax preparation, ensuring accuracy and maximizing your tax savings.

We understand that tax filing can be daunting. That's why we've built a system that can intelligently extract data from your financial documents, aggregate it, and provide personalized insights and predictions. Our goal is to make tax compliance easy, efficient, and accessible for everyone.

With GarudaTax AI, you can:

  • Upload various financial documents (Form 16, bank statements, etc.)
  • Get automated data extraction and aggregation.
  • Receive AI-powered tax-saving suggestions.
  • Access predictive insights on your tax liability and refunds.
  • Generate ITR forms with ease.
  • Keep a secure history of your past filings.

Our team is committed to continuously improving the platform, incorporating the latest tax regulations and AI advancements to provide you with the best possible tax filing experience.

Thank you for choosing GarudaTax AI!

); }; export default About;
